author: jaz
msg: implemented a trust any SSL client

author: jstrachan
msg: added support for Rescheduler pattern to be able to reorder a message flow using an expression or pluggable comparator. It had a fairly big effect on the codebase as we had to support custom Route implementations (since a route might be just some Services which lazily create a PollingConsumer)

author: niallp
msg: BEANUTILS-258 - enhance AbstractConverter to handle Array-->non-Array conversion, but exclude behaviour for ArrayConverter
